greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Consider the difference (A033873(k)) between the smallest prime > 10^k and 10^k; sequence lists the successive values of A033873(k) which are primes.
xref: This is the prime subsequence of A033873. Cf. A033874.
results.author: _Cino Hilliard_, Aug 27 2004
ext: Definition corrected by _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 03 2021. Thanks to _Harvey P. Dale_ for pointing out that something was wrong.
